this_title: The Imaginary Life of Federico Fellini
trans_title: 费德里科·费里尼想象中的生活
introduction: This is the life story of one of the greatest filmmakers and artists of all time, part real, part imaginary. It will pull us into the tormented and fantastic journey of the love/hate relationship between Federico Fellini and the great actress Giulietta Masina. The private and the public spheres of the great Italian master - winner of eight Oscars - blend together in an original and unusual life journey.
chinese_title: 费德里科·费里尼想象中的生活
foreign_title: The Imaginary Life of Federico Fellini
